titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4614) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-569, by Mr. Sessions.
All points of order against the consideration of the bill are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 196.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 694.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 209 - 182 (Roll no. 320).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/25/2004--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4614) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2005.
